name: Lost in the Temple
description:
You and your friend go to an adventure in a temple, but find out you're lost. Try to get a way out of this dangerous place.

Lost in the Temple is platformer game with some puzzles, where you play as two explorers.

Features
  • Play with two characters as you try to finish each level. But be careful: If one die, it's game over!
  • 12 levels mixing puzzle and platforming.

I recommend downloading the executable for better experience.

Made by RickZinho
